text: This army will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition while in Cult of Sigmar territory when the Sixth Book of Nagash is sealed.
The Cult of Sigmar has sealed the Sixth Book of Nagash - many warriors are suffering from magical attrition as a result of this ritual.
Sixth Book of Nagash sealed (Cult of Sigmar territory)
This army will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition while in Lizardmen territory when the Rite of Sotek is active.
The Lizardmen in this area have performed the Rite of Sotek - many warriors are losing their lives to this environment.
This army will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition while in Tomb Kings territory due to recent events.
Following a sudden rain, treacherous quicksand has erupted in this area - many warriors are being dragged down to an early grave beneath the desert.
